Title: Bobby Z
Writer: Bob Krakower (screenplay), Larry Schapiro (screenplay), Don Winslow (novel)
Actors: Paul Walker, Laurence Fishburne, Olivia Wilde, Jason Flemyng
Plot: A DEA agent provides former Marine Tim Kearney with a way out of his prison sentence: impersonate Bobby Z, a recently deceased drug dealer, in a hostage switch with a crime lord.
